plan.title: Update Parcel Type Definitions
plan.description: Add the 'delivered_at' field to the parcel type definition to support the new column in the UI.
rationale: The UI and API layers depend on the type definition to correctly handle the new 'delivered_at' field.
implementationChecklist: Add 'delivered_at: string | null' to the parcel type definition.
Ensure the type reflects the correct format and optionality.
doneWhen: 'delivered_at' field is present in the parcel type definition.

plan.title: Modify Parcel API to Include 'Delivered At' Field
plan.description: Update the parcel API to include the 'delivered_at' field in the parcel response.
rationale: The API needs to provide the 'delivered_at' data for the UI to display it.
implementationChecklist: Update the API response handling to include 'delivered_at'.
Ensure the API correctly formats the 'delivered_at' field.

plan.title: Add 'Delivered At' Column to Parcels Page
plan.description: Update the Parcels page to display the new 'Delivered At' column with sorting and filtering capabilities.
rationale: The new column needs to be visible on the Parcels page to meet the PRD requirements.
implementationChecklist: Add a new column for 'Delivered At' in the table.
Ensure the column is sortable and filterable.
Display 'Not Delivered' if the date is not available.
doneWhen: 'Delivered At' column is visible and functional on the Parcels page.

plan.title: Update Table Renderer for New Column
plan.description: Modify the TableRenderer component to support rendering of the 'Delivered At' column.
rationale: The TableRenderer component needs to be aware of the new column to render it correctly.
implementationChecklist: Update the rendering logic to include the 'Delivered At' column.
Ensure sorting functionality is integrated with the new column.
doneWhen: TableRenderer correctly displays and sorts the 'Delivered At' column.

plan.title: Add Tests for 'Delivered At' Column Functionality
plan.description: Create tests to ensure the 'Delivered At' column is displayed correctly and supports sorting and filtering.
rationale: Testing ensures that the new column functions as expected and does not introduce regressions.
implementationChecklist: Write tests to check the visibility of the 'Delivered At' column.
Test sorting and filtering functionality for the new column.
Verify the display of 'Not Delivered' for missing dates.
doneWhen: All tests for the 'Delivered At' column pass successfully.

acceptanceCriteria: All TypeScript compilation errors are resolved (tsc exits 0)
All existing tests continue to pass after changes
